Tenses

Do you want to learn Tenses in English?

What is a Tense?

A tense is a form of the verb that allows you to express time. The tense of the verb tells us when an event or something existed or when a person did something. Past, present, and future are the three main types of tenses tense is the time of a verb's action or its state of being, such as present (something happening now), past (something happened earlier), or future (something going to happen).
